games.summary: CHICAGO -- —Miles Bridgeshad 26 points and 14 rebounds, helping theCharlotte Hornetsbeat theChicago Bulls112-99 on Saturday night. Brandon Millerscored 22 points for Charlotte, andKon Knueppelfinished with 18.LaMelo Balladded 17 points and seven assists.

games.summary: SAN ANTONIO -- —Deni Avdijahad 29 points, 11 rebounds and 10 assists,Donovan Clinganadded a career-high 24 points along with 12 rebounds and thePortland Trail Blazersbeat theSan Antonio Spurs115-110 on Saturday night. Toumani Camarahad 20 points and eight rebounds as Portland led for all but 18 seconds in picking up its second straight victyory.
